name: Gez O'Brien
jobTitle: A 'How can we make this work?' consultant
testimonial: I was having a server problem, the kind of problem you don't want. Enter Tim — firstly he was; quick getting straight onto the server and diagnosing beyond the hardware and checking the logs and sure enough, he finds the software problem. Beyond that, as that issue was beyond my people, he was able to recommend someone to fix that small issue and within the hour the service was back up. Problem solved. In short, Tim was fast, professional, analytical and problem focussed. He looked beyond his 'job' (hardware) to find the problem (software) and suggest a pragmatic solution to get it fixed (Software freelancer). Initiative squared. Highly recommended.

name: Andrew Jancey
jobTitle: Need that extra hour in your day
testimonial: I have had the great pleasure of working with Tim in 2019 and what a fantastic experience it has been. Tim is extremely knowledgeable not only technically but also brilliant at Business Development. He is more than happy to share his experience and ways of working with others and I have learned from him. If you are thinking of working with Tim as a client or supporting him, I have absolutely hesitation in telling you it will be a great experience and also fun. Another positive to share he is so aware of cash flow for small businesses and always make sure my invoices are paid on time. I highly recommend Tim as a great business innovator.

name: Una Cottrell
jobTitle: I help businesses build sales funnels that convert
testimonial: I’ve been on Tim’s outer circle for a number of years, but met him properly when he was a team member of a client of mine when I worked on-site for 12 months. Tim’s role was 100% client-facing and he excelled at this. Extremely customer-focused, he was considerate and treated clients with the utmost integrity and professionalism. It’s pleasing to see Tim has gone freelance. Be aware that anybody who works with Tim will receive nothing but the best service and attentiveness. As freelancers, I look forward to seeing Him on the Manchester business circuit in addition to seeing his business flourish.

name: Paul Waring
jobTitle: Freelance PHP Developer and Linux System Administrator
testimonial: Tim was one of the contact points for a managed hosting account provided to my employer. He was always quick to respond to support emails and follow up where necessary to make sure that issues had been resolved satisfactorily.

name: James Lawrie
jobTitle: Linux Consultant, MySQL Consultant, Solutions Architect at silvermou.se
testimonial: Tim listens, and understands. He can listen to customer needs and understands the technical side enough to implement it himself if needed. This makes him a perfect fit anywhere along the spectrum from sales to engineering. This made Tim great to work with. He could manage customer expectations and changing needs allowing me to focus on what needed to be done. Don't trust him to play fair at Bzflag though.

name: Steph Gray
testimonial: I've been a customer of Bytemark and have known Tim through his work there and events I've organised that he's supported over five years or more. He's the friendly, approachable face of what can be quite a daunting world to folks like me from outside the natural world of Linux hosting and sysadminry. I've always felt Tim was happy to chat to me and he's always been full of good ideas both technically in terms of wider business/marketing. I wish him well with his next move.

name: Hannah Greer
jobTitle: Empowering Diversity & Inclusion | Disability Advocate and LGBTQ+ Champion | Social Mobility Enthusiast | Committed to Bringing Authenticity to the Workplace
testimonial:
Tim kindly arranged sponsorship from Bytemark Hosting for BarCamp Canterbury 2012 and 2013. He was helpful and friendly, and provided fantastic freebies which are still talked about by attendees, to this day! H
    is efficient and flexible, and was a real pleasure to work with.

name: Colin Cuthbertson
testimonial:
Tim is a DMC legend and one of the most well-rounded people I know. He joined the company back in 2008 and became the first full time member of our SysAdmin Team. He quickly built a great rapport with our clien
    and was the go to guy for help with VoIP and Linux problems. Tim is and adventurer and one of the greatest proponents of open source communities and social enterprise. We are lucky that he continues to help provide a first class
    service to our company in his role at Bytemark.

name: Daniel Morris
jobTitle: Engineering Leader | Agile Teams | Apps | APIs | Data | AI | LLM
testimonial: I had the luck to have Tim sysadmin our apps, absolutely saved the day repeatedly and always knew what to do!

name: Mark Taylor
jobTitle: Chief Executive Officer at Sirius Open Source Inc.
testimonial:
I've known Tim for years as he has progressed in the Open Source community and was delighted when he joined Bytemark. Tim is always available, always helpful, and has made doing great business with Bytemark a
  pleasure.

name: Colin Wren
testimonial:
I'd met Tim through NHS Hackday where he was diving into the chaos that happens when doctors and "geeks" get together. A while after St George's Healthcare NHS Trust was looking at moving from a Windows based
  server to a Linux based one as part of a website redevelopment. I immediately got in touch with Tim as not only do Bytemark offer such a great service at such a low price but their support and engagement with clients is excellent.
  He helped to pull together quotes and to explain the options with my colleague (who had the budget but lacked web server knowledge), this made everything easier for the final decision to be made.
